title: Summer
blurb: Summer is in the air, and there's nothing like a nice cold serving of Javascript to keep you cool.

speakers.title: React
speakers.name: Daniel Roberts
speakers.synopsis: React is a recently released library built at Facebook and Instagram that's making a lot of waves. Daniel will show you what you need to know to get started and illustrate how it can work alongside more traditional libraries such as Backbone.

speakers.title: Happy Parsing
speakers.name: Florent Vilmart
speakers.synopsis: Parse is a popular platform that greatly simplifies the backend side of web and mobile apps. Florent has been an active user for a while and will quickly get us up to speed on the basics and follow up with power tips and advanced usage.
